sentences.en: Appointing one woman to the otherwise all-male staff could look like tokenism.
sentences.cn: 给原本清一色的男职员队伍增派一位女性会显得是装点门面。

sentences.en: Be modest, otherwise you will lag behind.
sentences.cn: 要谦虚，否则就要落后。

sentences.en: Conditions should be laid down. Otherwise it's all talk.
sentences.cn: 应该先定下条件，否则全是空谈。

sentences.en: Don't be mean with fabric, otherwise curtains will end up looking skimpy.
sentences.cn: 别这么吝啬布料，不然做出来的窗帘会显得特寒酸。

sentences.en: He didn't want company, talkative or otherwise.
sentences.cn: 他不想跟人搭伴，不管这个伴儿是否健谈。

sentences.en: He was tired but otherwise in good health.
sentences.cn: 他除了累身体很好。

sentences.en: I could hear the distant noise of traffic. Otherwise all was still.
sentences.cn: 我能听见远处车流的声音，除此之外，一切都很安静。

sentences.en: I was feeling really ill, mentally and otherwise.
sentences.cn: 我觉得身心俱疲。

sentences.en: If he had done otherwise, I should have thought him a rascal.
sentences.cn: 如果他不这样做, 我就认为他是个恶棍.

sentences.en: My parents lent me the money. Otherwise, I couldn't have afforded the trip.
sentences.cn: 我父母借钱给我了。否则，我可付不起这次旅费。

sentences.en: people who smoke or otherwise abuse their bodies
sentences.cn: 吸烟或以其他方式糟蹋自己身体的人

sentences.en: Psychological twists perk up an otherwise predictable story line.
sentences.cn: 心理转折使原本老套的故事情节变得生动有趣。

sentences.en: Put your coat on, otherwise you’ll get cold.
sentences.cn: 穿上外套，不然你会着凉的。

sentences.en: The otherwise dreary book is enlivened by some very amusing illustrations.
sentences.cn: 这本枯燥乏味的书幸亏加了一些精彩的插图才变得生动有趣.

sentences.en: Their arrival livened up an otherwise dull afternoon.
sentences.cn: 他们的到来使原本沉闷的午后活跃起来了。

sentences.en: These weaknesses negated his otherwise progressive attitude towards the staff.
sentences.cn: 这些缺点抵消了他在其他方面对待员工还算开明的态度。

sentences.en: This expression gave temporary meaning to a set of features otherwise nondescript.
sentences.cn: 这一词语给整套节目以暂时的意义,否则毫无特色.

sentences.en: This spoiled an otherwise excellent piece of work.
sentences.cn: 这就把本来很出色的一件作品毁掉了。

sentences.en: To argue otherwise is trying to defend the indefensible.
sentences.cn: 持相反的论点就是试图为站不住脚的事情强辩。

sentences.en: Under otherwise equal conditions he is better than other boys.
sentences.cn: 其他条件都相同时,他比别的孩子好.

sentences.en: Was it just a temporary blip on an otherwise healthy growth curve?
sentences.cn: 这是否是原本良好的增长曲线中暂时的偏离？

sentences.en: we don't want a president, elected or otherwise.
sentences.cn: 我们不要总统，不管他是否是选举产生的。

sentences.en: We must achieve modernization of science and technology, otherwise we will lag behind other nations.
sentences.cn: 我们必须实现科学技术现代化，否则我们要落后于其他国家。

sentences.en: You'd better go now, otherwise you'll miss the train.
sentences.cn: 你最好现在就走, 要不然就赶不上火车了.

sentences.en: You’ll have to go now, otherwise you’ll miss your bus.
sentences.cn: 你现在就得走，要不然就赶不上公共汽车了。

trans.tran_cn: 另外的；其他方面的；原本，本来
否则，除此以外，与之不同地，以其他方式
trans.tran_en: used when saying what bad thing will happen if something is not done
